Name: Active Customers
Description: The number of customers that have at least one active customer agreement at the end of the period.

Name: Address Line 1 Description
Description: First line of the address, which includes street and building number.

Name: Adult Household Members
Description: The number of household members that are aged 18 years or older.

Name: Anti-money Laundering Monitoring Indicator
Description: Indicator if the customer account is monitored for transactions being suspicious of criminal activities involving the movement of money through accounts, banks and countries carried out using the financial institution.

Name: Arrears Amount
Description: The total amount of money which is owed to an organization on payments due on the account, but not received as of the payment due date.
